# Chapter 5: Dimensionality reduction techniques

The dataset was obtained from the United Nations Development Program.

```{r, dat}
human_ <- read.csv(file="C:/Users/D E L L/Documents/GitHub/IODS-project/Data/human_.csv")
str(human_)
```

Now we vizualize the data using a correlation plot matrix

```{r, cormat}
library(dplyr)
library(GGally)
library(corrplot)
ggpairs(human_)
cor(human_) %>% corrplot
```
